title: Please provide detailed documentation on icon asset usage and requirements
body: There isn’t any documentation for how icons are used, what sizes are required, what formats are supported, etc. Some is easier to figure out (but time consuming), where as other areas — such as the icons used on the Top Sites on the New Tab page just behaves weirdly.

comments.body: As the author of http://realfavicongenerator.net, I would like to make sure the service creates an Edge-ready icon. But as Daniel explained it, lack of documentation about Top Sites makes this difficult. Currently, the icons RFG generates are disappointing in Edge Top Sites.
